sub_topic: Probability of a certain weather event occurring
message_1: A city has a 30% chance of experiencing a rainy day in the month of May. What is the probability that it will not rain on a randomly chosen day in May?
message_2:
The probability of an event not occurring is equal to 1 minus the probability of the event occurring. In this case, the probability of it not raining on a randomly chosen day in May is:

1 - 0.30 = 0.70

So, there is a 70% chance that it will not rain on a randomly chosen day in May.
